games.name: WereBox
games.description: Werebox – physics game story begins! Werebox is a mobile game where Good meet Evil. This is a world full of balls. But some of them can turn into the boxes! They are called wereboxes! The player’s goal is to kick all the bad red boxes off the screen and leave the rest good ones. Use wisely your forces, ‘cause we don’t need unnecessary victims! Tap on the ball to transform it into the box and vise-versa. Some objects can be transformed, some not. Clear the world from the bad wereboxes and save the planet!

games.description: Get The Weight is an online game, which you can play absolutely for free! This game raises an excellent occasion for you to check your precision. Here, you encounter a balance and three weights. One scale is weighted with a random item, your luck is to guess the weight of it. Make your choice between big or small weight in order to increase another scale. Try to attain equilibrium, instantly obtain a higher score. games.name: Colorboom
games.description: Play online html5 version of famous game title 'Bob The Robber' on your device. From childhood Bob knew about his destiny, he developed all the necessary skills and trained too hard... Eventually, he was inspired with the heroic feats of Robin Hood and started his crusade! Rush onto a mission to clean out the premises and act like a real robber. With every level, you receive a notice and start committing an ideal crime. Try to pass unnoticed through various security systems and tracking cameras, pick up hidden cash in various unexpected places. Be smart and tricky, force the door locks, search for notes that will reveal pin codes to Bob and he will unlock the doors. Can you steal without being caught?

games.name: Jumping Light
games.description: Meet 'Jumping Light' html5 game where you play with jumping fireball. You control leaping directions of a fireball, preventing it from falling down past the green blocks. Just hold left or right to set moving direction of a blazing fireball. It should always touch the edge of green blocks going down and up like an equalizer, otherwise our glaring ball will drop. Try to stay alive and catch randomly appearing flashing dots on top of the blocks, it adds an extra point to your score. Play online with a vivid fireball, beat and share your best score!
